mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri".*, row_number() over (PARTITION BY "shoriName", "nendo" ORDER BY "nendoNaiRenban" DESC ) AS rowNo FROM rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" WHERE rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."isDeleted" = FALSE and rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."subGyomuCode" = 'DBC' AND rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."shoriName" = #{ 処理名 } AND rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri"."nendo" = #{ 対象年度 } ) as "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" WHERE "DbT7022ShoriDateKanri".rowNo = 1
